reliquary:Bookmark.NAME: Bookmark
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw an extra card for each #yInnate card in your deck.

reliquary:BrokenClock.NAME: Broken Clock
DESCRIPTIONS: Each combat starts with two player turns, then two enemy turns.

reliquary:Firecrackers.NAME: Firecrackers
DESCRIPTIONS: Overkill damage is dealt to all other enemies.

reliquary:IridiumChain.NAME: Iridium Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower card, put an #yEthereal copy into your hand that costs #b1 more.

reliquary:JackalopeHorn.NAME: Jackalope Horn
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, refund the Energy cost of the last card you played.

reliquary:KinkedSpring.NAME: Kinked Spring
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your discard pile can't shuffle into your draw pile during your turn.

reliquary:PorcupineQuills.NAME: Porcupine Quills
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive #b12 or more unblocked damage, deal that much damage back.

reliquary:PurpleTingedLeaf.NAME: Purple-Tinged Leaf
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose a card. Whenever you play that card, heal #b1 HP.

reliquary:RoseTintedGlasses.NAME: Rose-Tinted Glasses
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b2 times you draw a #yStatus each combat, #yExhaust it and draw a card.

reliquary:RosewoodLute.NAME: Rosewood Lute
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you block damage exactly, gain #b1 [E] next turn.

reliquary:QuartzCube.NAME: Quartz Cube
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat with #b2 or more enemies, apply #b2 #yStun to one. It can't be damaged while Stunned.

reliquary:ShortFuse.NAME: Short Fuse
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yLightning Orbs target the enemy with the least HP.
